readability_reflection: Concatenation is more readable because it feels more organic. + symbolizes adding together, so it makes more sense than {}.
comprehension_debugging: I mostly use concatenation, it's easier when dealing with user input.
preference_rationale: I would choose concatenation, it's easier to read and more people understand it.
learning_curve: I've never used interpolation myself, so it didn't feel natural for me. I understand why some people prefer it, but I like concatenation more.
suggestions_improvement: it would be easier to understand if long strings are broken up into smaller strings and then added together.
